name: Distant Sector [Very Early Prototype]
description:
A barely started space game. Plan is to make a Starsector/Distant Worlds hybrid. Feel free to throw suggestions and ideas.

Space - Restart

Mouse Scroll - Zoom

LMB - movement

RMB - sets a closest object to the cursor a target for movement, recommended way to orbit a planet or a star

Up/Down arrows - multiplies speed
